#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

char a[500], b[500], c[500];
int dp[451][451][451];

int lcs(int i, int j, int k)
{
	if(!i || !j || !k) return 0;
	
	if(dp[i][j][k] != -1) return dp[i][j][k];

	if(a[i-1] == b[j-1] && b[j-1] == c[k-1]) return 1+lcs(i-1, j-1, k-1);

	return dp[i][j][k] = max(lcs(i-1, j, k), max(lcs(i, j-1, k), lcs(i, j, k-1)));
}


int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);

	while(t--) {
		scanf("%s%s%s", a, b, c);

		int l = strlen(a);

		for(int i = 1; i <= l; ++i) for(int j = 1; j <= l; ++j) for(int k = 1; k <= l; ++k) dp[i][j][k] = -1;

		printf("%d\n", 3*(l-lcs(l, l, l)));
	}

	return 0;
}
